name: retributive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to, or intended to be, deserved and severe punishment: retributive action/justice There is speculation that his killing might have been retributive. They did not seek harsh retributory sentences for the protesters once order had been restored.
More examplesFewer examplesHe believes in retributive justice: punishment for its own sake. Is the punishment meant to be retributive, or reformative? Americans became the targets of retributive attacks.An investigation into a political enemy might be interpreted as retributive.
